description:
Located in New York, New York, the Heninger, Garrison & Davis, LLC, law firm has become one of our region's leading legal practices for those who have suffered serious injuries or losses as the results of others' negligent, careless or unlawful actions, as well as employees who have experienced violations of their basic rights as workers on the job.

Based in Birmingham, Alabama, with an additional law office in Atlanta, Georgia, we have achieved unprecedented success since our founding in 2006. Our attorneys promise to do whatever we can to improve the likelihood that you will obtain the favorable outcomes you expect for your legal challenges arising from any of the following:

• Personal injury and wrongful death
• Trucking and motor vehicle accidents
• Brain and spinal injuries
• Medical device injuries
• Pharmaceutical drug injuries
• Medical malpractice
• Nursing home abuse and neglect
• Consumer class actions and mass torts
• Insurance disputes
• Business litigation and intellectual property
• Workplace sexual misconduct
• Whistleblower claims

We have on our staff some of the brightest and most talented minds in the legal profession, and our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers. In addition, several of them are AV Preeminent peer-review rated,* the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell, and our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients as well. We find great reward in being able to help so many stand toe-to-toe against large corporations and insurance companies to get the justice they deserve.

No matter your means or your status in society, you can rely on us for the quality, effective legal counsel you need. We will remain in close contact with you throughout all legal proceedings to address your questions and concerns while providing regular updates as to the status of your case.

To begin the process of holding those responsible for your suffering accountable for their actions, you can contact Heninger, Garrison & Davis, LLC, to receive a free evaluation of your claim. We also offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
